scripts.release:local:prensa:v2: cd packages/xprog-prensa && yarn build && yarn release:local
scripts.release:prensa:v1: cd packages/prensa && yarn prerelease:copyfiles && yarn semantic-release --branches monorepo && yarn postrelease:copyfiles
scripts.release:prensa:v2: cd packages/xprog-prensa && yarn prerelease:copyfiles && yarn semantic-release --branches monorepo && yarn postrelease:copyfiles
